name: Sisters (itch) (LordDz)
description:
After struggling with the office grind for several years, Lydia has finally saved enough money to buy a small piece of land in the caribbean where the rest of her family are located.

Best played with headphones and a mouse during the night.

Controls:

  • Movement - WSAD
  • Interact - 'E'
  • Use - Left & Right Mouse
